title: Unable to add a discussion “Must be level 12 or higher to create a discussion”

embed.description: This board is the best place to discuss the alpha with Rioters and your fellow players, although it won't be our main source for feedback resolution. Look to the other tools, like the Submit Feedback button in the alpha client, for that. The boards are open to everyone, not just alpha participants.

body:
I’m an Alpha tester for the new client on OSX.  I can’t report bugs on this forum though because is says “Must be level 12 or higher to create a discussion” when I try to add a discussion.  Is this summoner level?  I’m level 30.  
Tried logging out and back in.  Gave it a day to sync and retried.  No joy.

replies.body:
If you hadn't used the boards in quite a while, this type of thing is bound to happen. Your Summoner and Boards profiles seem to have synced since this discussion was posted, so it looks like you're good to go.

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
